page_5.text: Oh no! A big rock blocked their path! Zoe thought hard. “Let’s push together!” she said. Teamwork made the rock roll away!
page_5.scene: Zoe and the aliens, pushing against a large, colorful rock, work together, their faces showing determination and joy as the rock begins to move.

character.name: Zoe
character.description: Zoe is a lively 6-year-old girl with big, bright eyes and curly hair. She wears a sparkly space helmet and a rainbow tutu, reflecting her imaginative spirit.
